data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 238 believers in the state of Pomurska into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pomurska, Slovenia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Pomurska, Slovenia to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Pomurska, Slovenia.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Pomurska to exponentially multiply disciples.
Spirit, make the church in Pomurska, Slovenia humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Murska Sobota
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Murska Sobota, Pomurska, Slovenia.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Pomurska, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Pomurska to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Pomurska, Slovenia.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Pomurska
location.cities_list: Murska Sobota, Ljutomer, Lendava, Beltinci, Radenci
location.cities_list_w_pop: Murska Sobota (11,614), Ljutomer (3,460), Lendava (3,129), Beltinci (2,394), Radenci (2,201)
